explains: n. 闲暇，业余时间；休闲活动
adj. 空闲的，有闲的；业余的
wordGroup: at leisure 从容地；闲着地
leisure industry 娱乐产业；休闲服务业

sentences.en: Leisure is often defined in opposition to work.
sentences.cn: 休闲常被定义为工作的反面。

sentences.en: Whale-watching has become a growth leisure industry.
sentences.cn: 观鲸业已成为一个快速发展的休闲产业。

sentences.en: On the whole, people miss the opportunity to enjoy leisure.
sentences.cn: 大体上说，人们都渴望享受休闲时光的机会。
